name: Legion of Super Heroes: Cosmic Boy Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Cosmic Boy's real name?
questions.explanation:
Rokk Krinn.

	Actor Wil Wheaton voiced the role of Cosmic Boy on the WB animated "Legion of Super Heroes" series.  Actor Ryan Kennedy portrayed Cosmic Boy on an episode of the TV series "Smallville".  Actor Yuri Lowenthal provided the voice of Cosmic Boy in "Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League - Cosmic Crash".

questions.text: In what year did Cosmic Boy first appear?
questions.explanation:
1958.

	Cosmic Boy made is debut alongside fellow Legionnaires Lightning Boy and Saturn Girl in 'Adventure Comics' #247.

questions.text: What is Cosmic Boy's native planet?
questions.explanation:
Braal.

	Cosmic Boy is born of Braalian parents and is thus a native of Braal.  He was, however, born on Earth during a period when his parents had relocated there.  He did eventually grow up on Braal.

questions.text: What is Cosmic Boy's power set?
questions.explanation:
Control of magnetism.

	All natives of the planet Braal have the ability to control and manipulate magnetism.  Cosmic Boy is considered to have above-average control.  His being born on Earth is alleged to be one of the reasons.

questions.text: Shortly after 'The Great Darkness Saga' storyline (1982), the apartment where Cosmic Boy's family resided was bombed.  Which member(s) of Cosmic Boy's family died in this event?
questions.explanation:
His mother (Ewa).

	Both Cosmic Boy's parents and brother were victims of the attack and suffered major radiation poisoning.  Hu and Pol survived and eventually recovered.

questions.text: In Cosmic Boy's first appearance his costume included a feature that was never utilized again.  What was it?
options: A wide belt with ringed planet on it
questions.explanation:
A clear bubble helmet.

	Think of a globe shaped goldfish bowl, upside down, over his entire head with no air hole or speaker box!

questions.text: Cosmic Boy lost his powers while fighting in the battle of Venado Bay during a war between his home planet and the home planet of what fellow Legionnaire?
questions.explanation:
Shrinking Violet.

	This story line occurred during the continuity referred to as 5YL (Five Years Later) or Legion 1.5, which was published from 1989 through 1994.

questions.text: Cosmic Boy's long time girlfriend/wife is a super hero as well.  Which member of the Legion of Substitute Heroes is his longtime sweetheart?
questions.explanation:
Night Girl.

	After losing his powers in Venado Bay, Cosmic Boy and Night Girl married and eventually had a son.

questions.text: Cosmic Boy is one of only five individual Legion of Super Heroes members that have had their own self-titled comic series.  What major DC cross-over event did the Cosmic Boy limited series tie into?
questions.explanation:
Legends.

	Published in 1986 and 1987, 'Cosmic Boy' the limited series follows Cosmic Boy and Night Girl as they travel back to the 20th century.

questions.text: Cosmic Boy was once fatally injured on a mission because he refused to use his powers in observance of a sacred holiday on his home planet ('Superboy' #215).  Which Legion villain saved his life?
questions.explanation:
Emerald Empress.

	Ultra Boy gambled that the Empress would respect Cosmic Boy's courage and offered to release her if she would help cure Cosmic Boy.
